issue.title: Add filter for imu, force torque data streams from AtlasPlugin.cc

content.raw:
I was about to report this. Below is the noise in the force and torque sensors when walking with the 5steps walker from BDI. I see sharp spikes when moving between feet

![http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013mar/force_torque/force_torque_feet.png](http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013mar/force_torque/force_torque_feet.png)

But asside from those spikes the numerical figures seem to add up to ROBOTMASS x -9.81

![http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013mar/force_torque/force_torque_sensors_closer_look.png](http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013mar/force_torque/force_torque_sensors_closer_look.png)
content.html:
I was about to report this. Below is the noise in the force and torque sensors when walking with the 5steps walker from BDI. I see sharp spikes when moving between feet

But asside from those spikes the numerical figures seem to add up to ROBOTMASS x -9.81
